"apita kalin ewwa waradune ethana thamayi.api danan hitiye na pampori gahiya yuthu widiya.hamadama api kale wadak patan ganna masa ganakata kalin indan patanganna eka pamporiya.eeta passe hena lokuwata malwedi gahala wisil gahala wade patan ganna.passe wipakshe un ahaddi arakata mokada une?.araka iwara karanne kawadda?.apita kata uththara na.ithin meda para api thiranaya kala horen patan ganda wade.korala iwarawela denawa pul pablisitiyak.tiwi eke ad danawa.pare katawut gahanawa.niwus walata pennanawa.hama paththarema danawa ful pej ad, nalu niliyo dethun denek lawwa honda kiyola danawa tiwi eke.'mita gam wasiyo' kiyala hama gamakama api gane banar danawa.natya yaddi yatin ara podi thiruweth danawa."

mema sammana pirinamanuye janathawa atharata gos daththa raskirime kriyawaliyak padanam kara ganimeni. 2012 sapthambar masaye sita 2013 pebarawari masaya yana kalaya thula mema samikshanaya pawathwu athara diwayine palath 9 nma janathawa ha siyalu jathin niyojanaya wana paridi wayasa wayasa awurudu 18-50 dakwa wayas kandayata ayath 2,700 kata wadi pirisak me sandaha yodagena atha. 2012 wasaredi selinko inshuwarans samagame warika aadayama lesa rupiyal biliyana 21.9 k upaya athi athara eyin rupiyal biliyana 11.1 k selinko samanya rakshana anshayen ha rupiyal biliyana 10.8 k jiwitha rakshana anshayen wartha kara atha.
